sense.def:
A snag
je majhna težava ali pomanjkljivost.

seg.quote: It cleans very effectively. The only snag is that it dissolves plastics.

sense.def:
To snag part of one's clothing on a sharp or rough object
pomeni, da se kos oblačila ujame na oster ali grob predmet in se strga.

seg.quote: I snagged my skirt on a bramble.
